subject: Re: Transfering my recorded session to my computer
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Ooops... forgot to give you the info, Kay:  Part # 274-373

http://www.radioshack.com/product/index.jsp?
productId=2062470&cp=&sr=1&origkw=1%2F8+to+3%2F32&kw=1%2F8+to+3%2F32&pa
rentPage=search

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Kay.  You'll get the same patch cable AND an adapter (1/8 female to 3/32 male, I 
think, 
> double check).  That's what I have to use on my Panasonic DR60, since the ear jack on 
that is 
> smaller.
> 
> Margaret
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psfponies" <psfponies@> wrote:
> >
> > I am heading to Radio shack after I get off work. I am taking the 
> > micro cassette recorder with me. The mic hole in the recorder is way 
> > smaller then the one that goes into the pc. The recorder is a Radio 
> > Shack recorder so hopefully they will have one. 
> > 
> > Kay
> >
>
